#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>

main()
{
int fall, t;
char wert[]={0,1,2,3,0,1,0,1,2,3,0,1,0,1,2,3,0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7,0,1}, str[100];

for(std::cin>>fall>>str;fall--;std::cout<<(int)wert[str[0]-'a']<<std::endl,std::cin>>str)
	for(t=1; t<strlen(str); t++)
		if(str[t]>str[0])
			str[0]=str[t];
return 0;
}
